tests.name: complete_nested_workflow_parse
tests.input:
database =
  host = localhost
  port = 5432
  enabled = true

tests.name: complete_nested_workflow_buildhierarchy
tests.input:
database =
  host = localhost
  port = 5432
  enabled = true

tests.name: complete_mixed_workflow_parse
tests.input:
app = MyApp
version = 1.0.0
config =
  debug = true
  features =
    feature1 = enabled
    feature2 = disabled

expected.value:
debug = true
  features =
    feature1 = enabled
    feature2 = disabled

tests.name: complete_mixed_workflow_buildhierarchy
tests.input:
app = MyApp
version = 1.0.0
config =
  debug = true
  features =
    feature1 = enabled
    feature2 = disabled

tests.name: complete_lists_workflow_parse
tests.input:
servers =
  server = web1
  server = web2
  server = web3
ports =
  port = 80
  port = 443

expected.value:
server = web1
  server = web2
  server = web3

tests.name: complete_lists_workflow_buildhierarchy
tests.input:
servers =
  server = web1
  server = web2
  server = web3
ports =
  port = 80
  port = 443

tests.name: complete_multiline_workflow_parse
tests.input:
description = Welcome to our app
  This is a multi-line description
  With several lines
config =
  settings =
    value1 = one
    value2 = two

expected.value:
Welcome to our app
  This is a multi-line description
  With several lines

tests.name: complete_multiline_workflow_buildhierarchy
tests.input:
description = Welcome to our app
  This is a multi-line description
  With several lines
config =
  settings =
    value1 = one
    value2 = two

expected.description:
Welcome to our app
  This is a multi-line description
  With several lines

tests.name: real_world_complete_workflow_parse
tests.input:
service = MyMicroservice
version = 2.1.0
database =
  host = db.example.com
  port = 5432
  credentials =
    user = service_user
    password = secret123
  pools =
    read = 5
    write = 2
logging =
  level = info
  outputs =
    output = console
    output = file
    output = syslog
features =
  feature_a = enabled
  feature_b = disabled
  feature_c = experimental

expected.value:
host = db.example.com
  port = 5432
  credentials =
    user = service_user
    password = secret123
  pools =
    read = 5
    write = 2

level = info
  outputs =
    output = console
    output = file
    output = syslog

feature_a = enabled
  feature_b = disabled
  feature_c = experimental

tests.name: real_world_complete_workflow_buildhierarchy
tests.input:
service = MyMicroservice
version = 2.1.0
database =
  host = db.example.com
  port = 5432
  credentials =
    user = service_user
    password = secret123
  pools =
    read = 5
    write = 2
logging =
  level = info
  outputs =
    output = console
    output = file
    output = syslog
features =
  feature_a = enabled
  feature_b = disabled
  feature_c = experimental
